messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Turn your suit sensors to max so that we can find you when you die, if you dont know how to do that please say so on comms

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Any assisstants who want a unique job go to the HoP desk

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Suit Sensors to Tracking people. I didn't think I have to say this so late into the shift.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: I guess I'm the captain for the time being. Continue what you were doing but do it better so I look good. Thank You

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.
